product_name: Sanuk Yoga Serenity Flip Flops - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from yoga mats, the women's Sanuk Yoga Serenity Flip-Flops will help you feel grounded even when you can't make it to the yoga studio. Footbeds are made from yoga mats; straps are made from synthetic leather with printed jersey liners. Rubber outsoles stand up to regular wear. The Sanuk Yoga Serenity Flip-Flops are vegan. Closeout.
short_description: Made from yoga mats, the women's Sanuk Yoga Serenity Flip-Flops will help you feel grounded even when you can't make it to the yoga studio.
